career.name: Core Team Member (Tech)
career.title: Google Developer Student Clubs JIIT 128
description: Built and maintained the official website of the club.
Developed Autamail, a web application to automate email communication for sponsors, chief guests, and participants of Bitbox 5.0
Collaborated with the organizing team to successfully conduct the club's flagship hackathon, Bitbox 5.0

career.name: Core Team Member
career.title: CICR JIIT 128
description: Built and programmed autonomous drones as part of club projects and demonstrations.
Actively mentored juniors during Techtonic 2.0, the club's annual flagship event, by teaching concepts in AI, ML, and robotics.
Assisted in managing workshops and sessions to guide students through practical tech applications and projects.
